juzs.text: 67|1|Barakatamaya tini, sarbamaya kartrtba [1] yamra hate; ara tini sabakichura upara ksamatabana.
67|2|Yini srsti karechena mrtyu o jibana, tomaderake pariksa karara jan'ya --- ke tomadera madhye amalera dika theke uttama? Tini parakramasali, ksamasila.
67|3|Yini srsti karechena stare stare sata asamana. Rahamanera srstite apani kono khumta dekhate pabena na; apani abara takiye dekhuna, kono truti dekhate pana ki [1]
67|4|tarapara apani dbitiyabara drsti pherana, se drsti byartha o klanta haye apanara dike phire asabe.

67|5|Ara abasya'i amara nikatabarti asamanake susobhita karechi pradipamala dbara [1] ebam seguloke karechi sayatanera prati niksepera upakarana ebam tadera jan'ya prastuta rekhechi jbalanta agunera sasti.
67|6|Ara yara tadera rabake asbikara kare tadera jan'ya rayeche jahannamera sasti ebam ta kata manda phire ya'oyara sthana
67|7|yakhana taderake sekhane niksepa kara habe takhana tara jahannamera bikata sabda sunabe [1], ara ta habe udbelita.
67|8|Rose jahannama yena phete parabe, yakhana'i tate kono dalake niksepa kara habe, taderake raksira jijnesa karabe, ‘tomadera kache ki kono satarkakari aseni?’
67|9|Tara balabe, ‘hyam, abasya'i amadera kache satarkakari esechila, takhana amara mithyaropa karechilama ebam balechilama, ‘allaha kichu'i nayila karenani, tomara to mahabibhrantite rayecha.’
67|10|Ara tara balabe, ‘yadi amara sunatama athaba bibeka-bud'dhi prayoga karatama, tahale amara jbalanta agunera adhibasi hatama na [1].’
67|11|Atahpara tara tadera aparadha sbikara karabe. Sutaram dhbansa jbalanta agunera adhibasidera jan'ya
67|12|niscaya yara gayeba abasthaya tadera rabake bhaya kare tadera jan'ya rayeche ksama o mahapuraskara.
67|13|Ara tomara tomadera katha gopane'i bala athaba prakasye bala, tini to antarasamuhe ya ache ta samparke samyaka abagata.
67|14|Yini srsti karechena, tini ki janena na? Athaca tini suksmadarsi, samyaka abahita.
67|15|Tini'i to tomadera jan'ya yaminake sugama kare diyechena; ata'eba tomara era dika-digante bicarana kara ebam tamra deya riyika theke tomara ahara kara; ara punarut'thana to tamra'i kache.
67|16|Tomara ki e theke nirbhaya hayecha ye, yini asamane rayechena [1] tini tomaderake saha yaminake dhbasiye debena, atahpara ta hathat kare'i thara thara kare kampate thakabe
67|17|athaba tomara ki e theke nirbhaya hayecha ye, asamane yini rayechena tini tomadera upara kankarabarsi jhanjha pathabena? Takhana tomara janate parabe kirupa chila amara satarkabani [1]
67|18|ara edera purbabartigana'o mithyaropa karechila; phale kirupa hayechila amara pratyakhyana (sasti).
67|19|Tara ki laksya kare na tadera upare pakhidera prati, yara pakha bistara kare o sankucita kare? Dayamaya allaha'i taderake sthira rakhena. Niscaya tini sabakichura samyaka drasta.
67|20|Dayamaya allaha chara tomadera emana kono sain'yabahini ache ki, yara tomaderake sahayya karabe? Kaphirara to rayeche prabancanara madhye.
67|21|Emana ke ache, ye tomaderake riyika dana karabe, yadi tini tamra riyika bandha kare dena? Baram tara abadhyata o satya bimukhataya abicala rayeche.
67|22|Ye byakti jhumke mukhe bhara diye cale, se-i ki thika pathe cale, na ki se byakti ye soja haye sarala pathe cale [1]
67|23|baluna, ‘tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena ebam tomaderake diyechena srabanasakti, drstisakti o antahkarana. Tomara khuba alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kara.’
67|24|Baluna, ‘tini'i yamine tomaderake srsti kare chariye diyechena ebam tamra'i kache tomaderake samabeta kara habe.’
67|25|Ara tara bale, ‘tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e pratisruti kakhana bastabayita habe?’
67|26|Baluna, ‘era jnana sudhu allah‌ra'i kache ache, ara ami to spasta satarkakari matra.’
67|27|Atahpara tara yakhana ta asanna dekhabe takhana kaphiradera cehara mlana haye parabe ebam bala habe, ‘eta'i hala ta ya tomara dabi karechile.’
67|28|Baluna, ‘tomara amake jana'o--- yadi allaha amake o amara sangiderake dhbansa karena athaba amadera prati daya pradarsana karena, tabe kaphiraderake ke raksa karabe yantranadayaka sasti hate
67|29|baluna, ‘tini'i rahamana, amara tamra upara imana enechi ebam tamra'i upara ta'oyakkula karechi. Atahpara acire'i tomara janate parabe ke spasta bibhraantite rayeche.’
67|30|Baluna, ‘tomara amake jana'o, yadi pani bhugarbhe tomadera nagalera ba'ire cale yaya, takhana ke tomaderake ene debe prabahamana pani?’
68|1|Nuna---sapatha kalamera [1] ebam tara ya lipibad'dha kare tara
68|2|Apanara rabera anugrahe apani unmada nana.
68|3|Ara niscaya apanara jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara
68|4|ara niscaya apani mahana caritrera upara rayechena [1].
68|5|Atahpara acire'i apani dekhabena ebam tara'o dekhabe
68|6|tomadera madhye ke bikaragrasta [1].
68|7|Niscaya apanara raba samyaka abagata achena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini samyaka janena taderake, yara hidayataprapta.
68|8|Kaje'i apani mithyaropakaridera anugatya karabena na.
68|9|Tara kamana kare ye, apani aposakami hona, tahale tara'o aposakami habe
68|10|ara apani anugatya karabena na pratyeka emana byaktira ye adhika sapatha kari, lanchita
68|11|pichane nindakari, ye ekera katha an'yera kache lagiye beraya [1]
68|12|kalyanera kaje badha danakari, simalanghanakari, papistha
68|13|rurha sbabhaba [1] ebam tadupari kukhyata [2]
68|14|ejan'ye ye, se dhana-sampada o santana – santatite samrd'dhasali.
68|15|Yakhana tara kache amadera ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara haya takhana se bale, ‘e to purbabatidera kalpa-kahini matra.’
68|16|Amara abasya'i tara sumra dagiye deba.
68|17|Amara to taderake pariksa karechi [1], yebhabe pariksa karechilama udyana-adhipatiderake, yakhana tara sapatha karechila ye, tara pratyuse aharana karabe baganera phala
68|18|ebam tara ‘insa'allah’ baleni.
68|19|Atahpara apanara rabera kacha theke eka biparyaya hana dila se udyane, yakhana tara chila ghumanta.
68|20|Phale ta pure giye kalobarna dharana karala.
68|21|Pratyuse tara eke an'yake deke balala
68|22|‘tomara yadi phala aharana karate ca'o tabe sakala sakala tomadera bagane cala.’
68|23|Tarapara tara calala nimnasbare katha balate balate
68|24|‘aja sekhane yena tomadera kache kono misakina prabesa karate na pare.’
68|25|Ara tara nibrtta karate saksama ---- e bisbasa niye bagane yatra karala.
68|26|Atahpara tara yakhana baganera abastha dekhate pela, takhana balala, ‘niscaya amara patha hariye phelechi.’
68|27|‘Baram amara to bancita.’
68|28|Tadera srestha byakti balala, ‘ami ki tomaderake balini, ekhano tomara allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana karachana kena?’
68|29|Tara balala ‘amara amadera rabera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karachi, amara to yalima chilama.”
68|30|Tarapara tara eke an'yera prati dosaropa karate lagala.
68|31|Tara balala, ‘haya, durbhoga amadera! Amara to chilama simalanghanakari.
68|32|Sambhabatah amadera raba e theke utkrstatara binimaya debena; niscaya amara amadera rabera abhimukhi halama.’
68|33|Sasti erupa'i haye thake ebam akhiratera sasti kathinatara. Yadi tara janata [1]
68|34|niscaya muttakidera jan'ya rayeche neyamatapurna jannata tadera rabera kache.
68|35|Tabe ki amara musalimaderake (anugataderake) aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
68|36|tomadera ki hayeche, tomara e kemana sid'dhanta diccha
68|37|tomadera kache ki kono kitaba ache yate tomara adhyayana kara
68|38|ye, niscaya tomadera jan'ya tate rayeche ya tomara pachanda kara
68|39|athaba tomadera ki amadera sathe kiyamata paryanta balabat emana kono angikara rayeche ye, tomara nijedera jan'ya ya sthira karabe ta'i pabe
68|40|apani taderake jijnesa karuna tadera madhye e dabira yim'madara ke
68|41|athaba tadera ki (allahara sathe) aneka sarika ache? Thakale tara tadera sarikaguloke upasthita karuka --- yadi tara satyabadi haya.
68|42|Smarana karuna, se dinera katha yedina payera gocha unmocita kara habe [1], sedina taderake daka habe sajada karara jan'ya, kintu tara saksama habe na
68|43|tadera drsti abanata, hinata taderake acchanna karabe athaca yakhana tara nirapada chila takhana to taderake daka hata sajada karate.
68|44|Ata'eba, chere dina amake ebam yara e banite mithyaropa kare taderake, amara taderake krame krame dharaba emanabhabe ye, tara janate parabe na.
68|45|Ara ami taderake samaya diye thaki, niscaya amara kausala atyanta balistha.
68|46|Apani ki tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, ta tadera kache durbaha danda mane haya
68|47|naki tadera kache gayebera jnana ache ye, tara ta likhe rakhe
68|48|ata'eba, apani dhairya dharana karuna apanara rabera nirdesera apeksaya, ara apani macha'oyalara n'yaya habena na, yakhana tini bisada acchanna abasthaya ahbana karechilena [1].
68|49|Yadi tara rabera anugraha tara kache na paumchata tabe tini lanchita abasthaya niksipta hatena unmukta praantare.
68|50|Atahpara tara raba take manonita kare take satkarmaparayanadera antarbhukta karalena.
68|51|Ara kaphirara yakhana kura'ana sone takhana tara yena tadera tiksna drsti dbara apanake achare phelabe ebam bale, ‘e to eka pagala.’
68|52|Athaca ta [1] to kebala srstikulera jan'ya upadesa.
69|1|Se abasyambhabi ghatana
69|2|ki se abasyambhabi ghatana
69|3|ara kise apanake janabe se abasyambhabi ghatana ki
69|4|samuda o ‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila bhitiprada mahabipada samparke [1].
69|5|Atahpara samuda sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyayakari pracanda citkara dbara
69|6|ara ‘ada sampradaya, taderake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pracanda thanda jhanjhabayu dbara [1]
69|7|ya tini tadera upara prabahita karechilena satarata o atadina biramahinabhabe; takhana apani ukta sampradayake dekhatena--- tara sekhane lutiye pare ache sarasun'ya khejura kandera n'yaya.
69|8|Atahpara tadera ka'uke'o apani bidyamana dekhate pana ki
69|9|ara phira‘a'una, tara purbabartira ebam ultiye deya janapada papacare lipta chila [1].
69|10|Atahpara tara tadera rabera rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale tini taderake pakara'o karalena --- kathora pakara'o.
69|11|Yakhana jalocchbasa hayechila niscaya takhana amara tomaderake arohana kariyechilama nauyane
69|12|amara eta karechilama tomadera siksara jan'ya ebam ejan'ye ye, yate srutidhara kana eta sanraksana kare.
69|13|Atahpara yakhana singaya [1] phumka deya habe ---ekati matra phumka [2]
69|14|ara parbatamala saha prthibi utksipta habe ebam matra eka dhakkaya tara curna-bicurna haye yabe.
69|15|Phale sedina sanghatita habe mahaghatana
69|16|ara asamana bidirna haye yabe phale sedina ta durbala-biksipta haye parabe.
69|17|Ara pherestagana asamanera pranta dese thakabe ebam sedina atajana phirista apanara rabera ‘arasake dharana karabe tadera upare.
69|18|Sedina upasthita kara habe tomaderake ebam tomadera kono gopana'i ara gopana thakabe na.
69|19|Takhana yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘la'o, amara ‘amalanama pare dekha [1]
69|20|‘ami drrhabisbasa karatama ye, amake amara hisebera sam'mukhina hate habe.’
69|21|Kaje'i se yapana karabe santosajanaka jibana
69|22|su'ucca jannate
69|23|yara phalarasi abanamita thakabe nagalera madhye.
69|24|Bala habe, ‘panahara kara trptira sathe, tomara atita dine ya karechile tara binimaye.’
69|25|Kintu yara ‘amalanama tara bama hate deya habe, se balabe, ‘haya! Amake yadi deya'i na hata amara ‘amalanama
69|26|ara ami yadi na janatama amara hiseba
69|27|‘haya! Amara mrtyu'i yadi amara sesa hata
69|28|‘amara dhana-sampada amara kono kaje'i asala na.
69|29|‘Amara ksamata'o binasta hayeche.’
69|30|Pheresataderake bala habe, ‘dhara take, tara galaya beri pariye da'o.
69|31|‘Tarapara tomara take jahanname prabesa kariye dagdha kara.
69|32|‘Tarapara take srnkhalita kara emana eka sekale yara dairghya habe sattara hata’ [1]
69|33|niscaya se mahana allahara prati imanadara chila na
69|34|ara misakinake annadane utsahita karata na
69|35|ata'eba, e dina tara kono suhrda thakabe na
69|36|ara kono khadya thakabe na ksata nihsrta sraba chara
69|37|ya aparadhi chara ke'u khabe na.
69|38|Ata'eba, ami kasama karachi tara, ya tomara dekhate pa'o
69|39|ebam ya tomara dekhate pa'ona tara'o
69|40|niscaya e kura'ana eka sam'manita rasulera (bahita) bani [1].
69|41|Ara eta kono kabira katha naya; tomara khuba alpa'i imana posana kare thaka
69|42|eta kono ganakera katha'o naya, tomara alpa'i upadesa grahana kara.
69|43|Eta srstikulera rabera kacha theke nayilakrta.
69|44|Tini yadi amadera name kono katha racana kare calate cesta karatena
69|45|tabe abasya'i amara take pakara'o karatama dana hata diye [1]
69|46|tarapara abasya'i amara kete ditama tara hrdapindera sira
69|47|atahpara tomadera madhye emana ke'u'i ne'i, ye tamke raksa karate pare.
69|48|Ara e kura'ana muttakidera jan'ya abasya'i eka upadesa.
69|49|Ara amara abasya'i jani ye, tomadera madhye mithya aropakari rayeche.
69|50|Ara e kura'ana niscaya'i kaphiradera anusocanara karana habe
69|51|ara niscaya eta suniscita satya.
69|52|Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna.
70|1|Eka byakti ca'ila, sanghatita hoka sasti ya abadharita [1]
70|2|kaphiradera jan'ya, etake pratirodha karara ke'u ne'i [1].
70|3|Eta asabe allahara kacha theke, yini urdhbarohanera sopanasamuhera adhikari [1].
70|4|Pheresata ebam ruha allahara dike urdhbagami haya [1] emana eka dine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara [2].
70|5|Kaje'i apani dhairya dharana karuna parama dhairya.
70|6|Tara ai dinake mane kare sudura
70|7|kintu amara dekhachi ta asanna [1]
70|8|sedina akasa habe galita dhatura mata
70|9|ebam parbatasamuha habe rangina pasamera mata
70|10|ebam suhrda suhrdera khomja nebe na
70|11|taderake kara habe eke aparera drstigocara. Aparadhi sedinera sastira badale dite ca'ibe tara santana-santatike
70|12|ara tara stri o bha'ike
70|13|ara tara jnati-gosthike, yara take asraya dita
70|14|ara yamine yara ache tadera saba'ike, tarapara yate eti take mukti deya.
70|15|Kakhana'i naya, niscaya eta lelihana aguna
70|16|ya mathara camara khasiye debe [1].
70|17|Jahannama se byaktike dakabe, ye satyera prati pitha dekhiyechila ebam mukha phiriye niyechila.
70|18|Ara ye sampada punjibhuta karechila atahpara sanraksita kare rekhechila [1].
70|19|Niscaya manusake srsti kara hayeche atisaya asthiracittarupe [1].
70|20|Yakhana bipada take sparsa kare se haya ha-hutasakari.
70|21|Ara yakhana kalyana take sparsa kare se haya ati krpana
70|22|tabe salata adayakarigana chara [1]
70|23|yara tadera salate sarbada pratisthita [1]
70|24|ara yadera sampade nirdharita haka rayeche
70|25|yacnakari o bancitera
70|26|ara yara pratidana dibasake satya bale bisbasa kare.
70|27|Ara yara tadera rabera sasti samparke bhita-santrasta
70|28|niscaya tadera rabera sasti hate nihsanka thaka yaya na
70|29|ara yara nijedera yaunangasamuhera hiphayatakari [1]
70|30|tadera patni athaba adhikarabhukta dasi chara, ete tara nindaniya habe na—
70|31|tabe ke'u ederake chara an'yake kamana karale tara habe simalanghanakari
70|32|ara yara tadera amanata'o pratisruti raksakari [1]
70|33|ara yara tadera saksyasamuhe atala [1]
70|34|ara yara tadera salatera hiphayata kare ---[1]
70|35|tara'i sam'manita habe jannatasamuhe.
70|36|Kaphiradera hala ki ye, tara apanara dike chute asache
70|37|dana o bama dika theke, dale dale.
70|38|Tadera pratyeke ki e pratyasa kare ye, take prabesa karano habe pracuryamaya jannate
70|39|kakhano naya [1], amara taderake ya theke srsti karechi ta tara jane [2].
70|40|Ata'eba, ami sapatha karachi udayacalasamuha ebam astacalasamuhera rabera – abasya'i amara saksama [1]
70|41|tadera ceye utkrstaderake tadera sthalabarti karate ebam ete amara aksama na'i.
70|42|Ata'eba taderake baka-bitanda o khela-tamasaya matta thakate dina– ye dinera pratisruti taderake deya haya tara sam'mukhina ha'oyara aga paryanta.
70|43|Sedina tara kabara theke bera habe drutabege, mane habe tara kono laksyasthalera dike dhabita hacche
70|44|abanata netre; hinata taderake acchanna karabe; eta'i se dina, yara bisaye satarka kara hayechila taderake.
71|1|Niscaya amara nuhke pathiyechilama tara sampradayera prati e nirdesasaha ye, apani apanara sampradayake satarka karuna tadera prati yantranadayaka sasti asara age.
71|2|Tini balalena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Niscaya ami tomadera jan'ya spasta satarkakari
71|3|e bisaye ye, tomara allahara ‘ibadata kara ebam tamra taka'oya abalambana kara, ara amara anugatya kara [1]

71|4|‘tini tomadera jan'ya tomadera papasamuha ksama karabena [1] ebam tomaderake abakasa debena eka nirdista samaya paryanta [2]. Niscaya allah kartrka nirdista samaya upasthita hale ta bilambita kara haya na; yadi tomara eta janate!’
71|5|Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Ami to amara sampradayake dinarata dekechi
71|6|kintu amara daka tadera palayana prabanata'i brd'dhi kareche.

71|7|Ami yakhana'i taderake daki yate apani taderake ksama karena, tara nijedera kane angula diyeche, kapara dbara dheke diyeche nijederake [1] ebam jeda karate thekeche, ara khuba'i aud'dhatya prakasa kareche.
71|8|Tarapara ami taderake dekechi prakasye
71|9|pare ami tadera jan'ya uccasbare pracara karechi o upadesa diyechi ati gopane’
71|10|atahpara balechi, ‘tomadera rabera nikata ksama prarthana kara, niscaya tini mahaksamasila
71|11|tini tomadera jan'ya pracura brstipata karabena
71|12|ebam tini tomaderake samrd'dha karabena dhana-sampada o santana-santatite ebam tomadera jan'ya sthapana karabena udyana o prabahita karabena nadi-nala [1].’
71|13|‘Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allahara sresthatbera para'oya karacha na [1]
71|14|athaca tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena paryayakrame [1].’
71|15|Tomara ki laksya karani allah kibhabe srsti karechena sata asamana stare stare bin'yasta kare
71|16|ara sekhane camdake sthapana karechena alokarupe o suryake sthapana karechena pradiparupe
71|17|tini tomaderake udbhuta karechena mati hate [1]
71|18|Tarapara tate tini tomaderake phiriye nebena ebam pare niscitabhabe bera kare nibena
71|19|ara allah tomadera jan'ya yaminake karechena bistrta
71|20|yate tomara sekhane calaphera karate para prasasta pathe.’

71|21|Nuha balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amara sampapradaya to amake aman'ya kareche ebam anusarana kareche emana lokera yara dhana-sampada o santana-santati tara ksati chara ara kichu'i brd'dhi kareni [1].’
71|22|Ara tara bhayanaka sarayantra kareche [1]
71|23|ebam baleche, ‘tomara kakhano parityaga karo na tomadera upasyaderake; parityaga karo na oyad, su'oya‘a, iyagucha, iya‘uka o nasarake [1].’
71|24|‘Bastuta tara anekake bibhranta kareche; kaje'i apani yalimadera bibhranti chara ara kichu'i brd'dhi karabena na [1].’
71|25|Tadera aparadhera jan'ya taderake nimajjita kara hayechila ebam pare taderake prabesa karano hayechila agune, atahpara tara allah byatita an'ya ka'uke'o sahayyakari payani.
71|26|Nuh ara'o balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Yaminera kaphiradera madhya theke kono grhabasike abyahati debena na [1].
71|27|Apani taderake abyahati dile tara apanara bandaderake bibhraanta karabe ebam janma dite thakabe sudhu duskrtikari o kaphira.

71|28|He amara raba! Apani ksama karuna amake, amara pitamatake ebam yara mumina haye amara ghare prabesa kare taderake ebam mumina purusa o mumina nariderake; ara yalimadera sudhu dhbansa'i brd'dhi karuna.’
72|1|Baluna [1], ‘amara prati ohi nayila hayeche ye, jinadera [2] ekati dala manoyogera sathe suneche [3] atahpara baleche, ‘amara to eka bismayakara kura'ana sunechi [4]
72|2|ya satyera dike hedayata kare; phale amara ete imana enechi. Ara amara kakhano amadera rabera sathe ka'uke sarika karaba na
72|3|ara niscaya'i amadera rabera maryada samucca [1]; tini grahana karenani kono sangini ebam na kona santana.
72|4|E'o ye, amadera madhyakara nirbodhera allah sambandhe khuba'i abantara ukti karata [1].
72|5|Athaca amara mane karatama manusa ebam jina allah samparke kakhano mithya balabe na.
72|6|E'o ye, kichu kichu manusa kichu jinera asraya nita, phale tara jinadera atmambharita bariye diyechila [1].’
72|7|‘E'o ye, tara dharana karechila yemana tomara dharana kara [1] ye, allah ka'uke'o kakhano punaruthita karabena na [2].’
72|8|‘E'o ye, amara ceyechilama akasera tathya sangraha karate kintu amara dekhate pelama kathora prahari o ulkapinda dbara akasa paripurna

72|9|‘e'o ye, amara age akasera bibhinna ghamtite sambada sunara jan'ya basatama [1]; kintu ekhana ke'u sambada sunate ca'ile se tara upara niksepera jan'ya prastuta jalanta ulkapindera sam'mukhina haya.
72|10|‘E'o ye, amara jani na yaminera adhibasidera amangala'i abhipraeta, na tadera raba tadera mangala cana [1].
72|11|‘E'o ye, amadera kichu sankhyaka satkarmaparayana ebam kichu sankhyaka era byatikrama, amara chilama bibhinna pathera anusari [1]
72|12|e'o ye, amara bujhechi, amara yamine allahke parabhuta karate paraba na ebam paliye'o tamke byartha karate paraba na.
72|13|E'o ye, amara yakhana hidayatera bani sunalama tate imana analama. Sutaram ye byakti tara rabera prati imana ane tara kono ksati o kono an'yayera asanka thakabe na [1].’
72|14|‘E'o ye, amadera madhye kichu sankhyaka ache musalima ara kichu sankhyaka ache simalanghanakari; atahpara yara isalama grahana kareche tara sucintitabhabe satya patha beche niyeche.
72|15|‘Ara yara simalanghanakari tara to hayeche jahannamera indhana.’
72|16|Ara tara yadi satya pathe pratisthita thakata tabe abasya'i taderake amara pracura bari barsane sikta karatama
72|17|Ya dbara amara taderake pariksa karate pari. Ara ye byakti tara rabera smarana hate bimukha haya tini take duhsaha sastite prabesa karabena.
72|18|Ara niscaya masajidasamuha allahara'i jan'ya. Kaje'i allahra sathe tomara an'ya ka'uke deko na [1].
72|19|Ara niscaya yakhana allahara banda [1] tamke dakara jan'ya damrala, takhana tara tara kache bhira jamala.
72|20|Baluna, ‘ami to kebala amara rabake'i daki ebam tamra sange ka'uke'o sarika kari na.’
72|21|Baluna, ‘niscaya ami tomadera kono ksati ba kalyanera malika na'i’
72|22|baluna, ‘allahra pakara'o hate ke'u'i amake raksa karate parabe na ebam allah chara ami kakhana'o kono asraya paba na [1]

72|23|‘sudhu allahara paksa theke paumchano ebam tamra risalatera bani pracara'i amara dayitba. Ara ye-ke'u allah o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare tara jan'ya rayeche jahannamera aguna, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe [1].’
72|24|Abasese yakhana tara ya pratisruta ta pratyaksa karabe, takhana tara janate parabe ke sahayyakari hisebe adhikatara durbala ebam sankhyaya sbalpa.
72|25|Baluna, ‘ami jani na tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta ki asanna, na amara rabera jan'ya kono dirgha meyada sthira karabena.’
72|26|Tini'i gayebi bisayera jnani, tini tamra gayebera jnana kara'o kache prakasa karena na [1]
72|27|tamra manonita rasula chara. Se ksetre allah tamra rasulera samane ebam pichane prahari niyojita karena [1]

72|28|yate tini prakasa karena ye, abasya'i tara tadera rabera risalata pauche diyechena [1]. Ara tadera kache ya ache ta tini jnane paribestana kare rekhechena ebam tini pratiti bastu ganana kare hiseba rekhechena [2].
73|1|He bastraabrta
73|2|rate salate damrana [1], kichu ansa chara
73|3|adha-rata ba tara ceye'o kichu kama.
73|4|Athaba tara ceye'o ekatu barana. Ara kura'ana tila'oyata karuna dhire dhire suspastabhabe [1]
73|5|niscaya amara apanara prati nayila karachi gurubhara bani [1].
73|6|Niscaya ratera belara utha [1] prabrtti dalane prabalatara [2] ebam bakasphurane adhika upayogi [3].
73|7|Niscaya dinera belaya apanara jan'ya rayeche dirgha karmabyastata [1].
73|8|Ara apani apanara rabera nama smarana karuna ebam tamra prati magna hona ekanisthabhabe [1].
73|9|Tini purba o pascimera raba, tini chara kono satya ilah ne'i. Ata'eba, takemi apani grahana karuna karmabidhayakarupe.
73|10|Ara loke ya bale, tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam saujan'yera sathe taderake parihara kare caluna [1].
73|11|Ara chere dina amake o bilasa samagrira adhikari mithyaropakariderake [1] ebam kichu kalera jan'ya taderake abakasa dina
73|12|niscaya amadera kache ache srnkhalasamuha o prajbalita aguna
73|13|ara ache emana khadya ya galaya atake yaya ebam yantranadayaka sasti [1].
73|14|Sedina yamina o parbatamala prakampita habe ebam parbatasamuha biksipta bahamana balukarasite parinata habe [1].
73|15|Niscaya amara tomadera kache pathiyechi eka rasula tomadera jan'ya saksisbarupa yemana rasula pathiyechilama phira‘a'unera kache
73|16|kintu phira‘a'una se rasulake aman'ya karechila, phale amara take atyanta saktabhabe pakara'o karechilama.
73|17|Ata'eba, yadi tomara kuphari kara, tabe ki kare antaraksa karabe sedina ye dinati kisoraderake parinata karabe brd'dhe
73|18|sedina asamana habe bidirna [1]. Tamra pratisruti abasya'i bastabayita habe.
73|19|Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye caya se tara rabera dike patha abalambana karuka

73|20|Niscaya apanara raba janena ye, apani salate damrana kakhana'o ratera praya du'i-trtiyansa, kakhana'o ardhansa ebam kakhana'o eka-trtiyansa ebam damraya apanara sange yara ache tadera ekati dala'o. Ara allahi nirdharana karena dina o ratera parimana [1]. Tini janena ye, tomara eta puropuri palana karate parabe na [2], ta'i allah tomadera ksama karalena [3]. Kaje'i kura'ana theke yatatuku sahaja tatatuku para, allah janena ye, tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u asustha haye parabe, ara ke'u ke'u allahara anugraha sandhane desa bhramana karabe ebam ke'u ke'u allahara pathe lara'iye lipta habe. Kaje'i tomara kura'ana hate yatatuku sahajasadhya tatatuku para. Ara tomara salata kayema kara, yakata pradana kara [4] ebam allahke da'o uttama rna [5]. Tomara tomadera nijedera jan'ya bhala ya kichu agrima pathabe tomara ta pabe allahara kache [6]. Ta utkrstatara ebam puraskara hisebe mahattara. Ara tomara ksama prarthana kara allahara kache. Niscaya allah ksamasila, parama dayalu.
74|1|He bastraacchadita! [1]
74|2|Uthuna, atahpara satarka karuna [1]

74|14|ara take diyechi sbacchanda jibanera pracura upakarana

74|27|ara apanake kise janabe ‘sakara’ ki
74|28|eta abasista rakhabe na ebam chere'o debe na [1].
74|29|Eta to sarirera camara puriye kalo kare debe
74|30|‘sakara’-era tattbabadhane rayeche unisajana prahari.

74|31|Ara amara to jahannamera prahari kebala pheresataderake'i karechi [1]; kaphiradera pariksasbarupa'i amara tadera e sankhya ullekha karechi yate kitabapraptadera drrha pratyaya janme, ara yara imana eneche tadera imana bere yaya. Ara kitabapraptara o muminara sandeha posana na kare. Ara yena era phale yadera antare byadhi ache tara o kaphirara bale, allah e (sankhyara) upama [2] (ullekha kara) dbara ki iccha karechena?’ Ebhabe allah yake icche pathabhrasta karena ebam yake icche hedayata karena. Ara apanara rabera bahini samparke tini chara ke'u jane na. Ara jahannamera e barnana to manusera jan'ya eka upadesa matra.

74|33|sapatha ratera, yakhana tara abasana ghate

74|47|abasese amadera kache mrtyu agamana kare [1].’

74|51|yara sinhera bhaye palayana kareche [1].
74|52|Baram tadera madhyakara pratyeke'i kamana kare ye, take ekati unmukta grantha deya hoka [1].

74|54|Niscaya e kura'ana to sakalera jan'ya upadesabani [1].

75|1|Ami sapatha karachi kiyamatera dinera [1]
75|2|ami ara'o sapatha karachi bhartsanakari atmara [1].

75|5|Baram manusa tara bhabisyate'o papacara karate caya [1].

75|8|ebam camda haye parabe kiranahina [1]
75|9|ara yakhana surya o camdake ekatra kara habe [1] –
75|10|sedina manusa balabe, ‘aja palanora sthana kothaya?’
75|11|Kakhano'i naya, kono asrayasthala ne'i.
75|12|Sedina thami habe apanara rabera'i kache.
75|13|Sedina manusake abahita kara habe se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe geche [1].
75|14|Baram manusa nijera samparke samyaka abagata [1]
75|15|Yadi'o se nana ajuhatera abatarana kare.

75|19|tarapara tara barnanara dayitba niscitabhabe amadera'i [1].

75|23|tara tadera rabera dike takiye thakabe [1].

75|25|asanka karabe ye, eka dhbansakari biparyaya tadera upara apatita habe.

77|35|Eta emana eka dina yedina na tara katha balabe [1]
77|36|ara na taderake anumati deya habe oyara pesa karara.
77|37|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|38|‘Eta'i phayasalara dina, amara ekatra karechi tomaderake ebam purbabartiderake.’
77|39|Atahpara tomadera kono kausala thakale ta prayoga kara amara birud'dhe [1].
77|40|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|41|Niscaya muttakira [1] thakabe chayaya o prasrabana bahula sthane
77|42|ara tadera banchita phalamulera pracuryera madhye.
77|43|‘Tomadera karmera puraskarasbarupa tomara trptira sathe panahara kara.’
77|44|Ebhabe amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki.
77|45|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|46|Tomara kha'o ebam bhoga kare na'o alpa kichudina, tomara to aparadhi [1].
77|47|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|48|Yakhana taderake bala haya, ruku kara takhana tara ruku kare na [1].
77|49|Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
77|50|Kaje'i tara kura'anera paribarte ara kon kathaya imana anabe [1]
